entry.title: Gone!
entry.content:
Yesterday I rode my bicycle from Chris Greene Lake to home after work, and somewhere along the ride my wedding band disappeared.

I rode along Earlysville Rd and then down Hydralic road to my apartment complex.

Other than loosing the ring, it was a nice ride.

entry.title: Old Photos
entry.content:
Our Wedding

Today I uploaded the official photos from our wedding. These photos are about 6 years old now, but I am moving them from my .Mac account to Picasa Web Albums to free space up from my remote backups and to consolidate all my public photos in one place.

Incidentally, I have more than one public gallery at Picasa.
